text: A hidden gem for koi enthusiasts. The koi here are top quality, with a beautiful variety to choose from. The team here genuinely cares about their health and lineage, and offers expert advice to customers. Farm is also clean and comfortable to visit üëçüèª

Singapore's biggest and most beautiful koi are undoubtedly found at Marugen Koi Farm. Johnny, Fergus, and all the other staff also provide excellent service, being extremely friendly and professional. I highly recommend Marugen Koi farm as the go-to location for local Koi hobbyists.

Best koi farm to go to.  The service from the team was excellent. We had a great time choosing our Kois. Fergus and team were very helpful and patient. He offered great advice on fish management.
Wouldn't go anywhere else, either for Koi or pellets.

Dropped by during Good Friday to pick up 3 Koi.  Thanks Johnny for helping me to choose 2 Showa and 1 Shiro.  Since my requirement is a koi that will slowly develop to its full potential, instead of one that is full developed.  That will make keeping koi more interesting....

Visited Marugen back in August after a very bad experience with another farm. All 7 koi‚Äôs died after being infected by 2 new fish from this other farm. Fergus was very thorough in explaining the issue and helped me step by step restoring my pond and introducing new fish that I bought from him. Picture attached shows how big the fish has grown in 6 months. Fergus is still helping me whenever I have questions about water quality or feed. Truly above and beyond service that I seldom see in other shops.
